Events

The Cat Friends Musical Shows

Let's have a wonderful time with our Cat Friends enjoying music, dance, and laughter!
Show schedules run from September to December 2025 to be held at Katt Theatre and The Cutest Cat Hall.

Upcoming show schedules

Tickets will be available one month before the show.
Stay tuned for the release date!
